function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High level of staff and management rotation may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases among different groups of employees.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of contagious diseases spreading within the local indigenous communities due to increased contact with external populations.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social activities such as mingas can lead to postponement of work and affect the rhythm of community life","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interactions between children aged 5 to 18 and the local population can lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in hr organization in the ’new normal’ can lead to challenges in implementing health and safety protocols for employees and visitors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and close contact during role-playing activities could facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exchange of ideas and practices between locals and foreign visitors could introduce new pathogens to the community.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encouraging waste collection through incentives may lead to increased human contact with waste, increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ecotourism bringing people from different parts of the world to indigenous communities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and connection to nature leading to unsustainable lifestyle.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","category":"Competitiveness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of program focused on traditional medicines with local shaman","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification of revenue streams including f&b, spa treatments, and transports","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Joint activities with local communities may increase the risk of disease transmission due to close contact and shared resources.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on traditional medicine for virus protection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased contact with nature may expose visitors to environmental health risks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within local communities and among international visitors due to close interaction and collaboration.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of social promiscuity leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of automation, machine learning, and artificial intelligence in customer service","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in society","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Innovation in business models to cope with the pandemic","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Millions of data points pouring in from various sources","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ml and ai algorithms distilling data into relevant knowledge for better customer service","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capturing contactless screening data from millions of patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skyrocketing calls to service centers in airline, hospitality, banking industries","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on chatbots for customer service","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of automation and ai in service businesses may reduce the need for human interaction, potentially limiting the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drone delivery and robot-powered delivery vehicles may minimize the need for human delivery personnel, reducing the potential for disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of ml and ai in service firms may optimize business operations, reducing the need for human involvement and potentially limiting disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusive shopping hours for vulnerable customers may not effectively minimize out-of-stock situations","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service firms may struggle to create new meaning for customers during shelter at home orders","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust and confidence in service venues","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing human interactions in service venues","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uber’s policy of inclusiveness and sharing of information may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shelter at home policies and social distancing challenges have impacted uber’s business model, potentially contributing to the spread of contagion as people seek alternative transportation options.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uber’s decision to deliver food from small restaurants free of charge may lead to increased demand and activity, creating challenges in maintaining safe and hygienic operations.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial institutions offering educational classes in basic financial literacy","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Price gouging by unscrupulous sellers during a pandemic","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly variable nature of online customer demand","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online communities and services in gymnasiums","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of online communities for hair salons","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inertial pressures to conform to laws, regulations, and decrees imposed by local and state governments.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deliberate communication strategies using accommodative signals are necessary, even if costly.","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Firms resisting the use of accommodative signals in communication","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Information asymmetry in pandemic situations can hinder effective communication and response","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surplus information held by some entities during a pandemic may not be effectively shared with others","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different frames of reference for the cause of the pandemic leading to differential influences on beliefs and attitudes","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socially constructed contagion frames of reference leading to different meanings and behaviors","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
